n: Dry Spice Rub for Lamb or Beef
des: "I got this recipe from my grama. It can be used on lamb or beef, and the flavors can be adjusted to suit your taste."
ins: Mix together the paprika, thyme, basil, cumin, and curry powder, if desired, in a small bowl. When ready to use, evenly sprinkle a light coating onto lamb or beef and pat into surface of the meat. For the most flavorful results, season meat and place in a resealable plastic bag; refrigerate 2 hours before cooking.
